comment.author: 98993639@N03
comment._content: How some one could deduce that dark matter exists from that photograph is unfathomable. I know alot about astronomy and physics but I never knew that creating a fictional "element" to bolster an incorrect theory was part of the scientific method. And everybody's wondering why the government has a budget crisis.
